name: Poppy Seed Muffins
ingredients: 1 ½ cup milk 2 ½ cups sugar
1 1/8 cup vegetable oil 1 ½ tsp. salt
1 ½ T. poppy seeds 1 ½ tsp. baking powder
steps: Combine wet ingredients: Add dry ingredients:
Mix all ingredients and beat for 2 minutes. Grease muffin tins. Bake at 350° for 22 minutes.
Mix glaze with spoon and pour over warm muffins.
¾ cup sugar ½ tsp. almond flavoring
½ tsp. vanilla ¼ cup orange juice (made up)
